about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Over 15 years creating magical moments in Mallorca
about.intro1: We are a company mainly dedicated to Bouncy Castle rental in Mallorca. We also have a specialized team in entertainment shows for the little ones.
about.intro2: From animation with costumes of their favorite cartoon characters, to face painting sessions where both children and adults will have a great time. We ensure seriousness and professionalism in our services, so that fun always goes hand in hand with safety. Our main objective is to offer our clients the best service, with very competitive prices. We travel throughout the island.
about.intro3: You can trust us for your party: bouncy castles, entertainment and water parties throughout Mallorca.

safety.title: Liability Insurance and Continuous Inspections
safety.description: For Mallorca DiverPark there is nothing more important than safety, especially when working with children and minors, so all our castles have liability insurance, safety and welfare rules for children, and we subject our castles to strict inspections to guarantee quality and safety. We also have experience in the care and control of children, being a safety element to avoid any damage or problem that may arise while children play with the castles.
safety.item3: Strict inspections to guarantee quality and safety
safety.item4: Experience in the care and control of children

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: We travel across the island of Mallorca: Palma, CalviÃ , Llucmajor, Manacor, Inca and any municipality. Setup and takedown are included.
faq.a2: Yes. All our castles have liability insurance and comply with safety standards (UNE14960).
faq.q3: How much does it cost to hire a bouncy castle?
faq.a3: The price depends on the model, duration and location. Request a no-obligation quote via WhatsApp or the contact form.
faq.q4: Do you offer entertainment and water parties?
faq.a4: Yes. As well as bouncy castles we offer foam parties, mechanical bull, children's entertainment (magicians, clowns) and full communions.
faq.a5: You can contact us by WhatsApp, via the website form or by phone. We will send you a quote and confirm the booking.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.intro: On this page you will find the legal notice that governs the use of this website.
legal.metaDescription: Legal notice of DIVERPARK - Bouncy castle rental in Mallorca
legal.identificationText: In compliance with Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Services of the Information Society and Electronic Commerce, we inform you that:
legal.objectText: This legal notice regulates the use of the website diverpark.net. Browsing the website grants you the status of user and implies your full acceptance of all the conditions included in this Legal Notice.
legal.conditionsText: The user agrees to make proper use of the contents offered on this website and not to use them to engage in illegal activities or activities contrary to good faith and the legal system.
legal.intellectualText: All website contents, including but not limited to, texts, photographs, graphics, images, icons, technology, software, as well as its graphic design and source codes, are the property of DIVERPARK, without any exploitation rights recognized by current legislation on intellectual property being understood as transferred to the user.
legal.responsibilityText: DIVERPARK is not responsible for damages that may arise from the use of the information on the website or contained in DIVERPARK's social networks.
legal.jurisdictionText: These conditions are governed by Spanish law. For the resolution of any conflict or discrepancy relating to the interpretation or application of these conditions, the parties expressly agree to submit to the jurisdiction of the courts and tribunals of Palma de Mallorca.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At DIVERPARK we are committed to protecting your personal data. Below we inform you about how we process the information you provide.
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy and data protection policy of DIVERPARK
privacy.purposeText: The personal data you provide will be processed for the following purposes:
privacy.purpose1: Manage inquiries and requests for information about our services.
privacy.purpose2: Send commercial information about our services (only if you have given your consent).
privacy.purpose3: Manage the contracting of our bouncy castle rental services.
privacy.legitimationText: The legal basis for processing your data is your consent, which you can withdraw at any time.
privacy.conservationText: Data will be kept for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected and to determine any responsibilities that may arise from that purpose and from data processing.
privacy.recipientsText: Data will not be transferred to third parties, except by legal obligation.
privacy.rightsText: You can exercise the following rights:
privacy.right1: Right of access to your personal data.
privacy.right2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data.
privacy.right3: Right to erasure when data is no longer necessary.
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, you can send us an email to {'catidiver@hotmail.com'}.
privacy.whatsappText: When contacting us via WhatsApp, your data will be processed by Meta (WhatsApp Ireland Limited). We recommend reviewing WhatsApp's privacy policy.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. On this page we explain what they are and how we use them.
cookies.metaDescription: Information about the use of cookies on DIVERPARK
cookies.whatAreText: Cookies are small text files that are stored in your browser when you visit our website. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences over a period of time.
cookies.technicalText: These cookies are essential for the website to function and do not require your consent. They are used to remember your preferred language and cookie preferences.
cookies.analyticsText: These cookies help us understand how you interact with our website and improve your experience. These cookies require your consent.
cookies.disableText: You can configure your browser to reject cookies. The links below show you how to do this in the most popular browsers:
